fields.name: Close Play
fields.description: Do you feel insecure about the game around the green. In this course, you will learn the secret behind a stable close game where the margin of error is greater than before. You will learn to hit the ball both high and low and how you can create more spin in the ball to make it stay faster. During the course we go through the technique of chipping and pitching.

fields.name: Private lesson 1 session
fields.description: Golf shop offers lessons for beginners to professionals. Our experienced staff can help you develop in the areas you need to improve in One session is equivalent to one hour.

fields.name: Private lession 2 sessions
fields.description: Golf shop offers lessons for beginners to professionals. Our experienced staff can help you develop in the areas you need to improve in two session is equivalent to two hours.

fields.name: Beginner course
fields.description: This is the course for you who are new to golf or for you who have previously taken a beginner's course but have not really started yet. You will have access to highly experienced and committed coaches who together have several years of experience in golf teaching for both beginners and professionals.

fields.name: Continuation course
fields.description: For those of you who have been playing for a while but have not yet reached Hcp 36. During the course, you get to try and develop the different parts of golf and repeat the basics under professional guidance. This gives you good conditions to continue your golf development according to your ambition, your conditions and goals.

fields.name: Beginner course
fields.description: Improve your game and learn the latest Tour proven techniques used by the best players in the worldLearn the four fundamentals of PuttingPutting stroke mechanicsLearn how to practice like a proLearn the secret to perform under pressuretwo hours training in a group of a maximum of 4 people.
